title: OBSCURA, ATHEIST, ORIGIN, DECREPIT BIRTH & FRACTAL UNIVERSE Add Four Dates To Their North American Tour
description: In Nevada, Alabama, Florida, and Arizona. The post OBSCURA, ATHEIST, ORIGIN, DECREPIT BIRTH & FRACTAL UNIVERSE Add Four Dates To Their North American Tour appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 5 hours ago
excerpt: In Nevada, Alabama, Florida, and Arizona.
text: Obscura, Atheist, Origin, Decrepit Birth, and Fractal Universe have expanded their North American tour (named Shred Fest 2025) with four additional dates. They are: 4/21 Las Vegas, NV Backstage Bar4/26 Birmingham, AL WorkPlay Theatre4/27 Jacksonville, FL Underbelly5/21 Phoenix, AZ The Rebel Lounge Shred Fest 2025's full routing is as follows. Tickets are available here. 4/20 San Diego, CA Brick by Brick4/21 Las Vegas, NV Backstage Bar4/22 Grand Junction, CO Mesa Theater4/23 Denver, CO The Oriental Theater4/24 Lawrence, KS The Granada4/25 Dallas, TX Trees4/26 Birmingham, AL WorkPlay Theatre4/27 Jacksonville, FL Underbelly4/28 Orlando, FL Conduit4/29 Greensboro, NC Hangar 18194/30 Richmond, VA Canal Club5/1 New York, NY Gramercy Theatre5/2 Boston, MA Middle East Downstairs5/3 Quebec City, QC Salle Montaigne5/4 Ottawa, ON Overflow5/5 Montreal, QC Fairmount Theatre5/6 Toronto, ON Lee’s Palace5/7 Pittsburgh, PA Preserving5/8 Chicago, IL Reggies5/9 Minneapolis, MN The Cabooze5/1 Winnipeg, MB Park Theatre5/12 Edmonton, AB The Starlite Room5/13 Calgary, AB Dickens5/15 Vancouver, BC Rickshaw Theatre5/16 Seattle, WA El Corazon5/17 Portland, OR Bossanova Ballroom5/18 San Francisco, CA DNA Lounge5/20 Albuquerque, NM Sunshine Theater5/21 Phoenix, AZ The Rebel Lounge5/22 Los Angeles, CA 1720 Want More Metal? html:
Obscura, Atheist, Origin, Decrepit Birth, and Fractal Universe have expanded their North American tour (named Shred Fest 2025) with four additional dates. They are:

4/21 Las Vegas, NV Backstage Bar
4/26 Birmingham, AL WorkPlay Theatre
4/27 Jacksonville, FL Underbelly
5/21 Phoenix, AZ The Rebel Lounge

Shred Fest 2025's full routing is as follows. Tickets are available here.

4/20 San Diego, CA Brick by Brick
4/21 Las Vegas, NV Backstage Bar
4/22 Grand Junction, CO Mesa Theater
